summary: Young Eddie loses his parents in an accident and his uncle leaves him for ten years in the care of his Hispanic rancher. In high school he reconnects with a girl from his past, and their grow an interracial relationship.
cast: Brendan Guy Murphy|Max Madore|Rubén Blades|Dana Delany|Stanley Tucci|Marissa Baca|Daniel O'Haco|Ryan Merriman|David Alexander Johnston|Rich Montague|Dave Adams|Michael Heistand|Paula Garcés|Heather Conforto|Miguel Ortega|Donald Everett Axinn|Gina Carizoza|Rey Chavez|Joe Duarte|Julie Davenport|Wendi Evans|Roshawn Franklin
keywords: teenager|interracial marriage|airplane crash|period film|coming of age
title: Spin
